label: TradeAllowanceCharge
comment: A component of pricing, such as an allowance or charge for trade purposes.

datatypeProperties.comment: The actual trade currency exchange for this trade allowance charge.
The code specifying the type of this trade allowance charge.
The code specifying the reason for this trade allowance charge.
The calculation percentage for this trade price.
A tax category of this trade allowance charge.
The indication of whether or not the applied allowance charge is a charge.
The indication of whether or not this trade allowance charge is prepaid.

referencedBy.comment: An allowance or charge applicable to this supply chain consignment.
An allowance or charge applied to the trade price.
An allowance or charge specified for this header trade settlement.
